description: Do not ask what the customer can do for you -. Ask what you can do for your client  in Entrepreneurship 101, you learn to see the world through the eyes of client- and oh what a view! The journey does not stop there. As the holy grail of specificity - while still within reach - there is still much to learn before you get it. That's how important it is to find your client, is to create a great product that will solve the customer's problem. How will the customer buy your product? How you will solve the customer's problem? What value will bring your product? What is the secret sauce? How do you face competition? From such diverse fields as virtual immortality, marketing small business, urban design, language teaching, health assistance and services entrepreneurial support, use case studies depth of entrepreneurs to examine how and developed its product concepts, solved the problem of his client, we established a clear value proposition, they refined their secret sauce, and understand your competition. The journey continues. Are you with us? The customer is waiting.
title: 15.390.2x_SPA: Entrepreneurship 102: ¿Que puedes hacer por tu cliente?
